CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Feedback_Question_1__c, '4') || ISPICKVAL( Feedback_Question_2__c, '4') || ISPICKVAL( Feedback_Question_3__c, '4'), 0.9, IF(ISPICKVAL( Feedback_Question_1__c, '3') || ISPICKVAL( Feedback_Question_2__c, '3') || ISPICKVAL( Feedback_Question_3__c, '3'), 0.7, IF(ISPICKVAL( Feedback_Question_1__c, '2') || ISPICKVAL( Feedback_Question_2__c, '2') || ISPICKVAL( Feedback_Question_3__c, '2'), 0.5, IF(ISPICKVAL( Feedback_Question_1__c, '1') || ISPICKVAL( Feedback_Question_2__c, '1') || ISPICKVAL( Feedback_Question_3__c, '1'), 0.3, 10)) ))
CustomField.label: Probability
